bibl.title: Horoscopic Ostraca from Medinet Madi.
bibl.note: Diss. Brown Univ. Summary in DA 67 (2006-2007) p. 3131-A. - Presents 34 Demotic ostraca containing 40 complete or partial horoscopes. The compositional style of Demotic and Greek horoscopes is contrasted. The calendars of Greco-Roman Egypt are explicated.
bibl.seg: ROSS Micah Tecumseh, Horoscopic Ostraca from Medinet Madi.

Diss. Brown Univ. Summary in DA 67 (2006-2007) p. 3131-A. - Presents 34 Demotic ostraca containing 40 complete or partial horoscopes. The compositional style of Demotic and Greek horoscopes is contrasted. The calendars of Greco-Roman Egypt are explicated.
